response:
reasoning='We size a folded-cascode OTA in a 0.18µm process, targeting ≤150µA total bias, AV0 ≥60dB, fUGF ≥50MHz. We choose uniform channel length L=0.36µm to boost output resistance for gain, and widths to set currents and transconductances. Input PMOS pair (P2/P3) get 40µm width at 50µA each; their NMOS loads (N10/N11) also 40µm. Cascode devices (P1/P4) and mirror transistors are narrower (10–20µm) with multipliers to generate bias branches. The output branch uses moderate widths (15µm) to drive 1pF load. Resistors R1=10k and R0=20k set about 140µA of tail current. All devices keep region=sat and foundry models. This sizing should yield adequate gain with limited current, ensuring the unity-gain bandwidth and phase margin targets are met.' config=ConfigFile(netlist='// Library name: MP4
// Cell name: fc_ota
// View name: schematic
subckt fc_ota VDD VSS ibn10u vin vip vout
* --- PMOS devices ---
P17 (BP2 ibn10u net22 VDD) tsmc18dP w=10u l=0.36u as=10u*2.5*(180n) ad=10u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*10u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*10u)+(5*180n) m=4 region=sat
P0  (net1 BP2 VDD VDD)     tsmc18dP w=10u l=0.36u as=10u*2.5*(180n) ad=10u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*10u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*10u)+(5*180n) m=4 region=sat
P16 (net22 BP2 VDD VDD)    tsmc18dP w=10u l=0.36u as=10u*2.5*(180n) ad=10u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*10u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*10u)+(5*180n) m=4 region=sat
P13 (BN2 ibn10u net18 VDD) tsmc18dP w=10u l=0.36u as=10u*2.5*(180n) ad=10u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*10u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*10u)+(5*180n) m=4 region=sat
P12 (net18 BP2 VDD VDD)    tsmc18dP w=10u l=0.36u as=10u*2.5*(180n) ad=10u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*10u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*10u)+(5*180n) m=4 region=sat
P1  (net12 ibn10u net1 VDD)tsmc18dP w=20u l=0.36u as=20u*2.5*(180n) ad=20u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*20u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*20u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P3  (net3 vip net12 VDD)   tsmc18dP w=40u l=0.36u as=40u*2.5*(180n) ad=40u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*40u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*40u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P2  (net4 vin net12 VDD)   tsmc18dP w=40u l=0.36u as=40u*2.5*(180n) ad=40u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*40u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*40u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P7  (vout ibn10u net16 VDD)tsmc18dP w=15u l=0.36u as=15u*2.5*(180n) ad=15u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*15u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*15u)+(5*180n) m=2 region=sat
P6  (net2 ibn10u net13 VDD)tsmc18dP w=15u l=0.36u as=15u*2.5*(180n) ad=15u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*15u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*15u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
P5  (net16 net2 VDD VDD)   tsmc18dP w=15u l=0.36u as=15u*2.5*(180n) ad=15u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*15u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*15u)+(5*180n) m=2 region=sat
P4  (net13 net2 VDD VDD)   tsmc18dP w=20u l=0.36u as=20u*2.5*(180n) ad=20u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*20u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*20u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
* --- NMOS devices ---
N15 (net11 BN1 VSS VSS)    tsmc18dN w=10u l=0.36u as=10u*2.5*(180n) ad=10u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*10u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*10u)+(5*180n) m=4 region=sat
N14 (BN1 BN2 net11 VSS)    tsmc18dN w=10u l=0.36u as=10u*2.5*(180n) ad=10u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*10u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*10u)+(5*180n) m=4 region=sat
N11 (net4 BN1 VSS VSS)     tsmc18dN w=40u l=0.36u as=40u*2.5*(180n) ad=40u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*40u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*40u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
N10 (net3 BN1 VSS VSS)     tsmc18dN w=40u l=0.36u as=40u*2.5*(180n) ad=40u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*40u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*40u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat
N9  (vout BN2 net4 VSS)    tsmc18dN w=15u l=0.36u as=15u*2.5*(180n) ad=15u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*15u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*15u)+(5*180n) m=2 region=sat
N8  (net2 BN2 net3 VSS)    tsmc18dN w=40u l=0.36u as=40u*2.5*(180n) ad=40u*2.5*(180n) ps=(2*40u)+(5*180n) pd=(2*40u)+(5*180n) m=1 region=sat

R1 (BP2 ibn10u) resistor r=10k m=1
